page.title: 08LEASINGHAM SCHOOL,LEASINGHAM
page.content: {Leasingham School}is situated in the village,by the{A15}road to{Lincoln. There are about{140 children}in the school aged between four and eleven. There are five classes in the school with one spare room used as a{library and{T.V room.}In the school there is a {school kitchen}which is used for storage now,but before it was used to make school dinners. The school has a {playground}and a{field}for playing various games.We have one{ {BBC"B"COMPUTER}in our school.Our computer teaches us in a fun way.We also have a{disk drive}which loads games quicker than a{tape recorder.}We have games such as{Fraction Snap}and Brick Up which teaches us spelling.We use{pens}and{pencils}for{writing}and drawing. We have a selection of text books and exercise books.We have a number of extra-curricular clubs.
